General.Name: Pineapple Resources Bhd
General.Description: Pineapple Resources Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the trade of hardware, software, peripherals, and accessories in Malaysia. It operates through two segments, Retailing of IT Related Products and Restaurant Operations. The company offers GPS, hard disk, laptop, and office automation products, as well as power banks, printers and consumables, smartphones, and tablets. It is involved in retailing computers and related accessories; and operates restaurants serving food and beverages. The company distributes its products through hypermarkets, shopping malls, and online stores. The company was formerly known as Disccomp Berhad and changed its name to Pineapple Resources Berhad in November 2012. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Pineapple Resources Berhad is a subsidiary of Chuan Huat Holdings Sdn Bhd.
